thread.title: Do Most People Need Life Insurance?

author: wsjcom
title: Do Most People Need Life Insurance?
text:
The rationale for life insurance is simple: Itâ€™s a way to protect family members financially in case a provider dies unexpectedly.
Yet fewer and fewer people are opting to invest in a policy, across a wide spectrum of the population.
According to a 2017 report by the Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago, 60% of households had life insurance in... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
